snippet: The F.B.I. director sharply criticized The Times on Thursday for anonymously quoting a member of a terrorist group in an article about the deadly attacks last week in France.
abstract: New York Times is criticized by FBI director James B Comey for anonymously using quote from Al Qaeda member in story on deadly terror attacks in France.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. director sharply criticized The Times on Thursday for anonymously quoting a member of a terrorist group in an article about the deadly attacks last week in France.

headline.main: F.B.I. Chief Criticizes Times on Qaeda Source
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Chief Criticizes Times on Qaeda Source

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
